description: This file defines a repository interface for User entity in a Spring Data JPA context, providing methods for querying users by email and checking email existence.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for User entity, facilitating database operations related to User objects.

methods.name: findByEmail
methods.description: Finds a User entity by email address, returning an Optional<User> to handle potential null results.

methods.name: existsByEmail
methods.description: Checks if a User with the specified email exists in the database.
